name: instantlogosearch
description: The fastest way to find logos from hundreds of brands, startups, and companies.

scripts.start: ( ( [ "$NODE_ENV" != production ] && npm run development ) || exit 0 ) && node server.js
scripts.generate_popup: mkdir -p generated/js && swig compile views/popup.html -m --wrap-start="var popup_tmpl = " >> generated/js/popup.js
